BLM activists threaten ‚Äòriots‚Äô and bloodshed if Mayor-elect Eric Adams reinstates controversial NYPD anti-crime units  

‚ÄûA Black Lives Matter leader said there will be ‚Äúbloodshed‚Äù after debating police reform with Mayor-elect Eric Adams during a contentious sit-down with the incoming Democrat at Brooklyn Borough Hall Wednesday.

Although Adams found common ground with the activists on plans to fight poverty in the black community, the former NYPD captain vowed to bring back the Anti-Crime Unit, which was disbanded during widespread police protests last year.

‚ÄúIf they think they are going back to the old ways of policing then we‚Äôre going to take to the streets again,‚Äù New York BLM co-founder Hawk Newsome said outside Borough Hall. ‚ÄúThere will be riots. There will be fire, and there will be bloodshed.‚Äù‚Äú

https://nypost.com/2021/11/11/blm-leader-hawk-newsome-threatens-riots-after-sit-down-with-eric-adams/

BLM leader says there will be ‚Äòbloodshed‚Äô after spat with Eric Adams over police reform 

A Black Lives Matter leader said there will be ‚Äúbloodshed‚Äù after debating police reform with Mayor-elect Eric Adams during a contentious sit-down with the incoming Democrat at Brooklyn Borough Hall Wednesday.

Although Adams found common ground with the activists on plans to fight poverty in the black community, the former NYPD captain vowed to bring back the Anti-Crime Unit, which was disbanded during widespread police protests last year.

‚ÄúIf they think they are going back to the old ways of policing then we‚Äôre going to take to the streets again,‚Äù New York BLM co-founder Hawk Newsome said outside Borough Hall. ‚ÄúThere will be riots. There will be fire, and there will be bloodshed.‚Äù [Article]

BLM threaten ‚ÄúBLOODSHED, RIOTS, FIRE‚Äù if Adams reinstates NYC Anti-Crime Unit

After a heated debate with NYC Mayor-elect Eric Adams, New York BLM co-founder Hawk Newsome warned there will be ‚Äúriots, there will be fire, there will be bloodshed‚Äù if controversial police reforms are pushed through. (NY Post)

‚ÄúWe will be at his front door, we will be at Gracie Mansion, we will be in the streets, if he allows these police to abuse us,‚Äù Newsome said. ‚ÄúI am not threatening anyone. I am just saying that it‚Äôs a natural response to aggressive oppression, people will react.‚Äù

Adams insisted he was the best-equipped person to bring meaningful change to the city, telling the NYP that ‚Äúif Black lives truly matter, then we must address violence in our communities while we address bias in policing. Yelling and not listening gets us nowhere.‚Äù

Subscribe to RT t.me/rtnews

No and Yes.  Fact Sheets for Healthcare Workers Administering Vaccines say that the person administering the vaccine must disclose that ‚Äúthe recipient or their caregiver has the option to accept or refuse‚Äù the COVID-19 Vaccine.  Fair enough, but this hasn‚Äôt prohibited vaccination by coercion.  There are many people who have been forced to accept a COVID vaccine to keep their jobs, and people who refused vaccination have lost freedoms and employment.  Coerced consent is and always will be unethical.

    Are we sure Pfizer-BioNTech Orange COVID vaccines are safe for children?

    No, and this is the most disturbing part of the October 29 actions.  The CDC insists the vaccines are safe for children.  But many prominent physicians have disputed this claim, saying that long term effects of vaccines on children are unknown.  I agree.  Without a time-machine, it‚Äôs impossible to know the future effects of vaccines given to children today.  But I‚Äôm not the only one who thinks this way.  At the 170th meeting of the FDA‚Äôs Vaccines and Related Biological Products Advisory Committee, Dr. Eric Ruben, Editor-in-Chief of the New England Journal of Medicine and temporary voting member of the committee, said, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre never going to learn about how safe this vaccine is unless we start giving it.  That‚Äôs just the way it goes.‚Äù  Dr. Ruben voted for authorization of experimental vaccines in children.  Whatever you think of his judgement, at least he‚Äôs honest about the safety data.  We don‚Äôt have any yet.

_source.message:
Through a FOIA request in 1977 a cache of approximately 20,000 documents relating to project MKULTRA were uncovered, prompting hearings. The CIA insisted that MKULTRA experiments were abandoned. However, a 14-year CIA veteran Victor Marchetti stated in various interviews that the CIA routinely conducts disinformation campaigns and CIA mind control programs carried on.

In a bizarre twist of happenstance, the director of the CIA who authorized Project Paperclip, MK Ultra, and Operation Mockingbird, Allen Dulles, is allegedly a distant cousin of Walt Disney, whose company has been associated with each of these programs.
 
The relationship between Walt Disney and the CIA was so close, that they actually played a key role in helping Disney with the purchase of the land to build Disney World. Disney hired Paul Helliwell, who ran CIA operations in Southeast Asia, and ‚ÄúWild Bill‚Äù Donovan, head of the spy organization that eventually became the CIA. With their help, Disney was able to purchase the land at a very low cost and retain control of the property.

To get the land cheaply and discreetly, ‚ÄúWild Bill‚Äù Donovan and his law firm created a number of shell corporations. Next, a disinformation campaign was orchestrated to keep locals from knowing that Disney was buying the property. If residents had known, they would have asked for more money. Eventually, people became suspicious and Walt Disney had no choice but to admit that he was building a park in Orlando. Property values immediately shot up. To maintain control of the large piece of property, Paul Helliwell created fake cities where the property was located, to install a compliant government in favor of Disney‚Äôs plans.
 
Disney‚Äôs close associations with the CIA have continued on to the present day, using big-brother spying techniques, which have been shared with the intelligence community. ‚ÄúDisney World is responsible for the nation‚Äôs largest single commercial application of biometrics‚Äù and after 9/11 the government sought ‚ÄúDisney‚Äôs advice in intelligence, security and biometrics.‚Äù Disney boasts the use of biometrics at their parks as well as their cruise line. A number of Disneyland employees have gone on to fill ‚Äúsome of the most sensitive positions in the U.S. intelligence and security communities,‚Äù including: Disney executive Gordon Levin, Eric Haseltine, and Bran Ferren.‚Äù

THE PEDOPHILIA KEY
A culture of pedophilia has been carried down from the very top of The Disney Company and infiltrated every aspect of the organization.
 
In an expose entitled, Hollywood Babylon II, Kenneth Anger alludes to a possible propensity towards pedophilia between Walt Disney and Bobby Driscoll. ‚ÄúSome animators stated that the boss [Walt Disney] seemed to have fallen in love with the boy. There may be some truth in this‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚ÄúThe boy, who Walt fell in love with, was a small young attractive boy actor named Bobby Driscoll who signed up in 1946 with Disney. He acted in Song of the South, Treasure Island and Bobby‚Äôs voice was used in Peter Pan.‚Äù Like so many childhood stars, Bobby displayed signs of trauma from childhood abuse, becoming a drug addict by the age of 17, and dying from overdose a few years later.

One of Disney‚Äôs directors, Victor Salva, was convicted of molesting a boy and filming one of the sexual molestations. Former Walt Disney Company executive Michael Laney has been sentenced to 81 months in prison for four counts of first-degree sexual abuse involving a 7-year-old girl. Director of music publishing at Disney Jon Heely,  who was arrested on three counts of lewd and lascivious acts on a child, is accused of abusing two underage girls. Furthermore, multiple pedophile rings involving Disney have been uncovered through the years, involving dozens of Disney employees ranging in positions from ticket sales to night shift managers.
 
Recently unsealed Epstein documents reveal that victim Virginia Roberts-Giuffre named, among others, Democratic Senator of Maine, George Mitchell as one of her pedophile rapists.
